Getting current gameweek information

Source: R/fct_get_current_gw.R
get_current_gw_info.Rd

This function fetches the current gameweek information

get_current_gw_info()

Examples

get_current_gw_info()
#>   id        name       deadline_time average_entry_score finished data_checked
#> 1 14 Gameweek 14 2022-10-29 10:00:00                  59     TRUE         TRUE
#>   highest_scoring_entry deadline_time_epoch deadline_time_game_offset
#> 1              10449657          1667037600                         0
#>   highest_score is_previous is_current is_next cup_leagues_created
#> 1           134       FALSE       TRUE   FALSE               FALSE
#>   h2h_ko_matches_created
#> 1                  FALSE
#>                                                     chip_plays most_selected
#> 1 bboost, freehit, wildcard, 3xc, 129184, 36581, 100238, 61414           318
#>   most_transferred_in top_element top_element_info.id top_element_info.points
#> 1                 369          23                  23                      19
#>   transfers_made most_captained most_vice_captained
#> 1        9082241            318                  28
